title: ISic003550. An antiquarian 'forgery'
body:
Facsimile Images

Πετρονία [. 7.]
ἔζησεν ἀμέμπτως καὶ σεμνῶς
ἔτη ιβ´ μῆνας δ´ ἱμέρας δ´
Γ(άϊος) ((·)) Κορνήλιος πατὴρ
5εἰδίᾳ εἰδίᾳ [. 5.]

Apparatus criticus

Text after comparison of Kaibel, Filippi and SEG, prioritising Kaibel's transcription of the manuscript tradition

translation

commentary

As Korhonen lucidly details, the inscription is one of a series of late 18th century local antiquarian forgeries, constructed on the basis of existing texts, principally those to be found in the 1769 first edition of the corpus of Torremuzza. Kaibel classed the entire series already as forgeries in IG XIV.

bibliography

  • 14.0017* https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001072
  • 52.0895 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • Filippi 2002 74 no. 1/9 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001991
  • Filippi 2005 63 no. 1/9 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002296
  • Korhonen 2017 198 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001484
